ComicInfo.Summary:
Judge Dredd tracks down a live broadcast of an illegal game show where contestants are killed if they give the wrong answer.
The Norts continue their assault on Dix-I with a Sun Legion drop, with a 3rd wave being launched from the Orange Sea.
